name: ag-grid-community
description: Advanced Data Grid / Data Table supporting Javascript / React / AngularJS / Web Components

scripts.initMarketing: git checkout marketing && npm run updateCoreDependencies && npm run buildCore
scripts.updateCoreDependencies: lerna bootstrap --scope ag-grid-community --scope ag-grid-enterprise --scope ag-grid-angular --scope ag-grid-react --scope ag-grid-vue --scope ag-grid-aurelia --scope ag-grid-docs
scripts.resetNonDocs: git checkout packages/ag-grid-community && git checkout packages/ag-grid-community && git checkout packages/ag-grid-angular && git checkout packages/ag-grid-react && git checkout packages/ag-grid-aurelia && git checkout packages/ag-grid-vue
scripts.buildAndTest: lerna run build --ignore ag-grid-polymer-example && lerna run test
scripts.buildCore: lerna run build --scope ag-grid-community --scope ag-grid-enterprise --scope ag-grid-angular --scope ag-grid-react --scope ag-grid-vue --scope ag-grid-aurelia
scripts.updateAndRebuild: npm run updateDependencies && npm run build
scripts.updateAndRebuildFull: npm run updateDependencies && npm run fullBuild
scripts.init: npm run initLatest && npm run updateAndRebuild
scripts.initFullBuild: npm run initLatest && npm run updateAndRebuildFull
